description: Saracens back Tom Parton leaves the club to join Japanese side Panasonic Wild Knights.
title: Tom Parton: Saracens back leaves to join Japan's Panasonic Wild Knights
title_page: Tom Parton: Saracens back leaves to join Japan's Panasonic Wild Knights  - BBC Sport
maintext:
Saracens back Tom Parton has left the club to join Japanese side Panasonic Wild Knights.
The 26-year-old, who can play at full-back or on the wing, joined Saracens from London Irish in the summer of 2023 and made 29 appearances for the club.
He scored eight tries for Sarries, including the fastest-ever Premiership hat-trick in 13 minutes against Gloucester in April.
"It's been an honour and privilege to have represented this club," Parton told the club website.
"I've made memories and friends for life. Thank you Saracens for giving me this experience and can't wait to watch the successes of the club for the rest of the season."
